website_summaries.verdict: Built to go the distance, this backseat car organizer boasts loads of handy features that both adults and children can appreciate.
pros: Multiple pockets of varying sizes offer plenty of storage space for everything from toys to stationery
Clear tablet holder accommodates tablets up to 11” and features a convenient headphone jack opening
Top and bottom fasteners ensure a good fit that lies flat against the seat
cons: Some owners report noticing a chemical odor upon opening

customer_reviews.title: The good the bad ...
customer_reviews.text: I have owned products like this one before an always was disappointed, however I decided to purchase two of these for our new car in hopes it might be better then other brands . Unfortunately this one isn’t better , the zipper won’t zip while attached to the seat , the tablet holder leans forward instead of holding back tight , you can’t put much in the pocket beneath or it would fall out . The cup holders seem to be the only thing that truly holds tight For the price I’m very disappointed . Honestly I wouldn’t waste the money they cost
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy organizer holds a ton of car junk!
customer_reviews.text: I'm really impressed at this car seat organizer. Hubby has been on my case for awhile, so this is helping keep the minivan under control! Two big sippy cups fit in the drink holders, and they won't sweat all over the floor due to neoprene insulation. The whole thing is nice and stiff, not saggy like some all fabric ones I've seen. There's a big plastic back piece, so I expect it'll stay stiff and strong for a long time. Lots of pockets for markers, pens, activity books, etc. We don't have car tablets, but the clear pocket is nice for other stuff, too. My toddler tells me about the moose every time she gets in the car now!
customer_reviews.author: M. T. Jaegerman

customer_reviews.title: Surprise for grandkids
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two as a surprise for my son's car. He left it at our place while on vacation. They were easy to install. I filled them with the girls things and it appears they will be able to reach the top half pockets from their car seats. They have DVD players behind the headrests, but if they had iPads, I think the clear space for them would Ben too low as the car seats are high.They quality was good but I can’t speak to how they like them yet.
customer_reviews.author: Andi P.

customer_reviews.title: Great for road trips!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this organizer so that our 3-year-old could have books and toys within reach and so he could watch movies on a tablet. Even in a fairly large truck, he can easily pull out books and put them back while secured in his car seat. He can also have a drink, snack or toy handy. We mainly wanted this for summer road trips and so far, it fits the bill. The organizer seems to be well made with durable fabric and neoprene. The pockets are a good size to fit even wide books. We have not tried movies yet, but it seems like that would work well. Very pleased overall!
customer_reviews.author: DChaud21

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome organizer. Looks great and functions exactly as described. The pocket behind the tablet sleeve is neat too...i put paper for my son to draw back there for long drives. My son has the kids edition of the amazon fire tablet and it fits inside the sleeve with the case and the touchscreen still works great through the sleeve. Took me a little minute to tighten the lower strap bc of how close my middle console is to the seat but i managed. Would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Gaby

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Organized The Car
customer_reviews.text: I am a bit of neat freak but that's nearly impossible to be with a 5 year old in the car. This organizer holds her Amazon tablet, white board, whiteboard wipes, markers and various toys within her arms reach so I'm not trying to reach for things at every red light that have slid across the floor! It would benefit the organizer to have 2 straps along the back seat as opposed to one to keep it from folding in but it does the trick!.
customer_reviews.author: DORI W.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, durable and functional
customer_reviews.text: We have taken this thing across the country, from one car to a rental car, to one state and into the next. This is one of the best purchases I ever made for me and my toddler. We bought a portable DVD player and it fits perfectly in the big pocket on the top. She watches shows while her Dad and I drive and drive. I keep sunscreen, baby wipes, sunglasses and DVDs in this thing as well as the DVD player. Even for short trips around town, this is so useful!
customer_reviews.author: loveurneighbor

customer_reviews.title: Great product and excellent response from seller
customer_reviews.text: The product design and functionality is great, wife and kids love it and use it all the time, really helps with organization in the car and specially for long road trips but also in daily commute. Now having said that I did have problems with the units I received as the tread for some pockets got undone and part of the net rip but I am still giving 5 stars because I contacted DMoose (seller) and they are sending me replacements as part of their warranty, excellent costumer service, they are fixing the issue quickly and professionally. Now just a matter of waiting for replacements and see how they do.
customer_reviews.author: Fireslash

customer_reviews.title: Great quality with lots of useful pockets
customer_reviews.text: Great quality with lots of useful pockets. My only complaint is the white snap on the clear iPad case! Why?! It’s just a sleeve...the iPad really shouldn’t be falling out when the seat back protector is strapped to the seat. Lol. The snap is on the iPad screen interfering with the view of the screen. I’ll be taking a razor blade and cutting it out so as not to obstruct the view of the screen. Otherwise, I love the product and think it’s great quality and worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Pp

customer_reviews.title: Good value.. but difficult to install
customer_reviews.text: We put these on the back seats of our Honda Odyssey.. it doesn't install well on the seats, the strap and buckle is too short to reach (unless you wrap around the front of the seat making it annoying to sit on the seat. We wrapped around and under the arm rests, so it works, but I had to really manhandle it to get the buckle to connect. Lots of pockets though - and the top zipper pocket is a nice place to hide valuables out of sight - it's roomy. Good value for the price if you can secure it properly to your seat.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Grayson

customer_reviews.title: Great Treat Cady for Ride Share
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my hubby, who drives for a ride share on the side. It is well- made and looks nice - not cheap. He hangs it on the back of the driver's seat and stocks it with bottled water and snacks for his riders and it works great. The side pockets each accommodate a water bottle. The front pockets accommodate power bars and other packaged snacks.
customer_reviews.author: 1SandrainSF

customer_reviews.title: Could be just a bit sturdier
customer_reviews.text: I really like this thing- tons of places to put things! My main beef is that after about a year the top part has ripped really badly. It's convenient, so I have just used safety pins to pin it back together for now. Honestly, though, if the whole point of this thing is to be for kids, it's going to get kicked and pulled on. It would be nice if it could last more an a year.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with broken clip
customer_reviews.text: One of the three I ordered arrived with a broken clip on the top strap which makes it completely unusable (it won't hang from the seat in front of it). Unfortunately, I ordered this way ahead of the time I needed it, so by the time I found out that it was broken, the time ran out on the return window. Just ordered another- hoping for better results. Other than that, this has everything you'd need. I especially love the carabiner clips. Just make sure you double check everything when it first arrives.
customer_reviews.author: BKCCW

customer_reviews.title: Compact and has enough compartments to hold lots of items
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a backseat organizer to hold some paper/book and crayons, snacks, water bottle and few other items to keep my daughter entertained during car rides and this was perfect. It was easy to secure and has lots of compartments to keep lots of items and is convenient to use. Had it only for a week now, but we are happy so far
customer_reviews.author: SR

customer_reviews.title: Great for storage too low for tablet
customer_reviews.text: Love this item for storage. Holds everything we need, but I admit a full pack of wipes won't really fit as pictured. Still, great compartments for quick and easy access to so many different items. Only criticism is that the clear pocket for storing an ipad or tablet is too low for comfortable viewing. Our Volvo SUV has stadium style seating so our son has to arch his neck down to see the ipad when its in the pocket. This is probably perfect for a sedan though.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy W.

customer_reviews.title: Buy better car organizer than this one!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this organizer for my 4 years old son. I wanted something simple but functional. Something, what will help me to organize my son's stuff and keep all his toys handy. However, I am really disappointed. It is made from really cheap material. As you can see on the picture, tablet holder has fallen apart completely. Not worth a penny. I wish I did better research on AMZ before, there are plenty of better car organizers.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Stone

customer_reviews.title: Could be better.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our son to use while on long trips. The over all product is exactly what it's intended to be used for, but the slot for the iPad does NOT fit a 10" ipad. It really made finagling the ipad irritating.
customer_reviews.author: Sara B.

customer_reviews.title: So fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I travel a lot for work (about 22-25,000 miles a year) and I put snacks, extra sunglasses, notepads, medicine bottles in all the pockets. Even has some caribeaner clips that I have extra hair ties on. I love this thing so much. I can’t inagine needing another one anytime soon, so I wanted to leave a good review to encourage everyone else to consider this one.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Engle

customer_reviews.title: LOOOOOONG bus ride with very little space
customer_reviews.text: I was a chaperone with our high school band. We took charter buses from SE Texas to Florida. We have approx. 230 members in the band, plus adults, and it looked like I would have to share a seat. After searching the web, my best bet was to buy something like your product to hang on the back of the seat in front of me. It worked perfectly!! The student never knew it was hanging there, and I had extra room with so many items “hanging”! It was also really easy to remove. Because I have an iPad and not a tablet, I used the space for books!
customer_reviews.author: Patti

customer_reviews.title: Sleek, sturdy, practical car organizer
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install (two snaps), drink pockets fit around a toddler thermos, tablet pocket fits the amazon kids 7" fire tablet and the organizer is not too bulky when filled (takes up less space and not as easy for the toddler to kick with legs). The bottom mesh pockets aren't quite large enough to fit a kirkland size bag of wipes, but minor detail when we get back all the space from the other items. Zipper pocket is a bonus when hiding treats or trinkets out of sight.
customer_reviews.author: tranrepeats

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t fit large tablet (10in kids fire) with the protective tablet case.
customer_reviews.text: Decent car seat organizer if you want it for actually organizing. I got it it function as an organizer but also for my sons tablet!! It says it hold large tablets (we have the 10in kids fire.) it JUST fits without the protective case.... which makes it even more of a hassle to use since now I need to take the case off of the table first and then put it back onwhen we’re leaving the car. I guess this is just a personal problem LOL.... if you have a smaller tablet it would be a good option!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer M.

customer_reviews.title: Everything at their fingertips!
customer_reviews.text: When I needed to add an infant seat to my backseat next to two booster seats, my older grandchildren lost the use of their cup holders due to limited space. The Moose fixed the problem. Now I have all the space they need. My grandchildren even pronounced me the best grandma ever! I have only had the backseat organizer for two weeks so I can't speak to durability, however it seems to be very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Ginny

customer_reviews.title: It looks like it'll work as advertised for those cars it fits
customer_reviews.text: It looks like it'll work as advertised for those cars it fits. However, these don't fit well with cars that have extremely contoured backs (i.e. bulge out significantly at the top) because all of the pockets face downward; they'd work better in cars with flat seat backs. The tablet holder was also unsuitable for cars using child seats in middle row captain chairs (like in our minivan) because the kids would have to look too far down and may not even see it over their feet.
customer_reviews.author: Stei0229

customer_reviews.title: Fits wide seats of our Toyota Tundra 2013 comfortably- excellent qualiry
customer_reviews.text: Was able to put these in my Toyota Tundra 2013 comfortably. Those are pretty wide seats, and I was afraid they wouldn't have straps long enough, but they work great! Quality is excellent. Very durable stiff fabric and tight stitching. I love that the pockets are big enough for lots of books and have clear pocket for a tablet, or just for better visual of toys or books. Great choice for us!
customer_reviews.author: Brock, Natali, Justin & Aiden

customer_reviews.title: May work for some but not what we needed
customer_reviews.text: Bought but never used. Ended up eventually throwing it away. Have no idea if its durable. We ended up using a headrest deal for a screen holder and outgrown the need for this big unwieldy thing on the back of the seat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We love this thing
customer_reviews.text: We love this thing. We turn it backwards and use it as a kick guard in the car. We turn it around for longer drives and let our daughter watch movies (HD Kindle 8). We also take it on airplanes for her to watch movies and organize her play items and drinks. Very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Costs more than others but still cheap
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this and get a lot of use out of it...but within 2 months of minimal use the ipad holder is already torn and frayed. I think the ipad has been put in there 2-3 times and otherwise there has been nothing in it. Very disappointed since I had hoped the more expensive item would at least last a bit longer.
customer_reviews.author: SG

customer_reviews.title: With five kids the car can get pretty messy but with this product everything can be organized ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a life savor for organizing my car. With five kids the car can get pretty messy but with this product everything can be organized and take the hassle out of road trips with the kids. Everything they need is neatly organized right there and ready to go.
customer_reviews.author: Shazie

customer_reviews.title: Pockets are too small to be useful
customer_reviews.text: This seems to be well made, and it has long enough straps, but the pockets are too small width and depth wise to be useful. :( I put books in the zipper top like shown and it buckled forward. The viewing pouch is also pretty small.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps your car so much more organized
customer_reviews.text: This product is easy to install, holds a lot of items, and keeps the car insanely organized. My car is a hot mess of baby toys, diapers, plastic bags of snacks, and trash. And once something has fallen underneath the driver and passenger seat, it was there forever. Now, everything is neatly placed in the organizer. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought this
customer_reviews.text: I've wanted one of these to fit in front of the carseat for my grandson when he's in my car. I liked the different compartments that this one has as well as the small clips from which keys and toys can be hung. I had hoped it would be a bit stronger in its shape and thickness, but it's working well so far!
customer_reviews.author: mb

customer_reviews.title: Great product/Excellent Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful product. It is the perfect thing for all my kid's stuff in the backseat. I have one for each child, and after about a year, one of them started to tear and come apart. I remembered that they were lifetime guaranteed so I contacted customer service and they sent a new one right out to me. Love a company that stands by its product and strives to please the customer. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, durable organizer
customer_reviews.text: The back seat organizer is nearly perfect. It is well made and has a great variety of pockets and storage options. Everything is within easy reach. We did have to purchase a headrest tablet holder as the tablet pocket was too low with the height of our Graco car seat, but the organizer was still an excellent travel addition for our child.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy S

customer_reviews.title: Great Organizer for Toddlers!!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for a 4-year old toddler and he loves it! It has plenty of pockets and spaces for all the essentials in a young toddler's life. And best of all it has a holder for his tablet! I'm not sure about the durability yet as it was a Christmas gift for him (and his mom).
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Croxton

customer_reviews.title: A must have for your child
customer_reviews.text: This little organizer has been a life saver not just for road trips but to and from school, grocery store, and other in-town outings. No more losing small items. Everything is in view. We have not had this long enough to know how it holds up to the daily wear and tear usage. But for now on what I see I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love this. My car feels so much more organized and having the tablet holder is awesome for long trips. Tablet holder holds amazon fire kids tablet with the case in which is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Amelia Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: This was a life saver for our long car trip!
customer_reviews.text: My two grandkids loved this....they packed all their essential traveling items in here for the road trip to Colorado. It kept them busy when the trip got boring for them....they had it full and it was easy for them to get what they needed when they needed it. It was super easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy K.

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Dmosse is one of two different backseat car organizer I bought and I can tell the difference in how well it made. No surprises what you see is how it is. Highly recommend. For my other car seat organizer I bought the strap broke off.(Cartik)
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Very large Organizer
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with this back seat organizer. it is larger than I thought it might be, but I think that is actually ok. It seems sturdy and well made. We have put it to use for our two grandkids.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: My child loves these
customer_reviews.text: I just bought a new car and this product works great. We have a 5 yr old who is hungry all the time when he gets in the car. We fill the moose up with all kind of snacks and fruit, pack the tablet for long trips and my car stays clean. Love the moose and my child loves the name
customer_reviews.author: D. Muscatelli

customer_reviews.title: Nice and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: We bought three of these as gifts for our grandkids who always have lots of things to bring with them for activities in the car. Kids can be tough on things like this but I am impressed with how sturdy they are and how they are set up. We have not seen how they fit or work in the car yet but the initial impression is good.
customer_reviews.author: Dave S

customer_reviews.title: The organizer is okay and holds a lot of stuff ...
customer_reviews.text: The organizer is okay and holds a lot of stuff...but the plastic party that holds the iPad ripped a few weeks into it and the whole thing stank to high heaven when taking it out the package.
customer_reviews.author: LennyMak

customer_reviews.title: Bad design.
customer_reviews.text: Sides flop forward because there’s nothing to hold them into the seat. Bad design.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Cook

customer_reviews.title: It worked out beautifully! It held stuffed animals
customer_reviews.text: This came quickly! Needed for a 9yr old and 5yr old on a 5 hour journey in an SUV. I research and saw this product. It worked out beautifully! It held stuffed animals, portable DVD players, iPads, dvd's, tissues, wipes, headsets, drinks, snacks, and more. It was a purchase that came out better than I anticipated!
customer_reviews.author: s jo

customer_reviews.title: ... of seat organizer for traveling and this was the perfect one for my vehicle
customer_reviews.text: I was searching for back of seat organizer for traveling and this was the perfect one for my vehicle. .Excellent quality and roomy storage pockets. Highly recommend, however, be sure check your car, SUV or truck style to make sure size will fit. Prompt delivery
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Smith

customer_reviews.title: Nice and surprising.
customer_reviews.text: I look forward to using this. I didn’t realize it had thermal pockets, those will be nice for drink in the car. The snaps seem very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: ehbaker2

customer_reviews.title: Not as practical as I’d hoped
customer_reviews.text: Okay for the price. Hard for toddler to reach things since it’s on the back of the seat but that’s no fault of the product. But after a couple months of very light use, some of the pockets are ripping off so not sure how much use we will get out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Edmonds

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok.
customer_reviews.text: The cup holders barely hold a water bottle. It’s very flimsy because it’s only latched to the head of the seat. But for car trips and every day use for children it’s good to have organization.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for road trips!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our trip! Lots of different sized pockets and places to fit most of our kids favorite travel accessories. Helped keep the car organized and saved space in the backseat an don the floor board for other items.
customer_reviews.author: Annabri

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS NOW!!! :) Don't look any further!!
customer_reviews.text: this is amazing!!!! I have an Acura MDX and it fits great on the back on the seats!! The kids have been kicking my seat and this organizer stands up to everything! The pockets on the sides for the drink bottles are great and the kids love that they each have their own compartments with zippers too! We use the top pocket for our tablet which has made movie time in the car a breeze!! Thanks for making a great product; I have referred this to many of my friends!!!
customer_reviews.author: Hillary

customer_reviews.title: Not made the best
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed in the car seat organizer because it fell apart within only a couple of days. Now it just hangs and gets in the way until I find a sturdier one.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install! Great product
customer_reviews.text: This item is one of those Amazon gems that are better in person than pictures. Highly exceeded my expectations. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Stella Belle

customer_reviews.title: Organization at its best!
customer_reviews.text: This organizer is really cool. My son has everything at hand when hes in the car. He can put his upad there and i keep wipes and his wireless headphones at reach. I really love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amalia N.

customer_reviews.title: good customer service.
customer_reviews.text: The first one I received broke on first use (tablet pocket ripped along the side while pulling out a kids edition kindle fire). I informed the company and they immediately sent a replacement that is working beautifully without problem. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: PedPsychDoctor

customer_reviews.title: Jury Still Out on DMoose Car Backseat Organizer
customer_reviews.text: We loved the image and the product we saw when we opened the box. We don't know how well this product will go over with the grandchildren. We bought two organizers for the grandchildren as Christmas gifts.
customer_reviews.author: David C. Pfriem

customer_reviews.title: Lots of stuff will fit
customer_reviews.text: I tote my two grandkids around every day and their stuff was taking over the back seat. One is still in a harness seat and could not reach his things. Now they each have their own organizer and can reach what they need. So many pockets and fun spaces. Love these!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa L. Myers

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: This bag was not completely sewn. It had a few stitches at the top of the right side and that was all. I am going to try to repair it because my granddaughter was so looking forward to it. I will not buy from this company again. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: BonSueShi

customer_reviews.title: They Are Ok
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting more I guess, but they tend to droop making them look a bit cheap.
customer_reviews.author: MeInHS

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Great. I haven’t loaded it down with stuff (yet) but it seems like a perfect way to keep things out of the way and organized. The strap is hidden in the cracks of the seat and it stays out of the way of our knees even with things in it.
customer_reviews.author: Kdn

customer_reviews.title: Original product bought said 2 per package
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like that I paid 19.99 and thought I was getting 2 (since I have twins and need both front seats covered). Somehow I got one and when I clicked on product description it is now a different price and just 1.... Will be calling Amazon on this one.... Seems a little fishy to me
customer_reviews.author: Heather Moreland

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of pockets
customer_reviews.text: Love all the pockets this has to offer. Great quality I can tell that it will last quite a while, was shorter then I imagined but it works well. What sold me was the amount of storage it has and my son was easily able to operate his iPad with it in the plastic screen sleeve part.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Acebo

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Overall I like this product I wish while hanging the sides wouldn’t come down but it’s still ok
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Fits snug to back seat. Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I had bought one previously from a different company and it just hung there. Always in the way. This one fits snuggly and I’m able to put WAY more stuff in it. It’s also a better quality material. Well worth my time and money. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Double duty item
customer_reviews.text: Love this to protect my seat from toddler tantrums and keep all her stuff off the floor of the car.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: ... for the back of each front seat) and we loved them! I couldn't believe how much stuff we ...
customer_reviews.text: We got 2 (one for the back of each front seat) and we loved them! I couldn't believe how much stuff we could put in them. I loaded them up the night before our road trip and thought I had them pretty full. My kids loaded them up even more over the course of our trip and back home. They did sag some from the weight, but even so they held up well. When I unloaded them at home & took them out they seemed to be in great shape.
customer_reviews.author: Smileleeface

customer_reviews.title: Great for many things
customer_reviews.text: Really love this organizer. So nice for everyday use as well as traveling. I put surprises in the compartments when we go on road trips for my toddler to find and it protects my seat.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Anyone who travels with children - this is a must! I have them on both seats. One with my 6 year olds items and one with my infants travel items. LOVE them. Keeps everything off of the floors of the car and you don’t have to go digging through bags to find things you need.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Dace

customer_reviews.title: Great for an SUV
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son. My grandson now has everything he needs when he gets into Daddys SUV
customer_reviews.author: K9Saver

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit tablet/CD player
customer_reviews.text: The description is incorrect. The website states iPad holder fits 11 inches and the paperwork that arrives with it says 12 inches. After measuring the actual size of the pouch, it is only 10 inches. Will be returning because our device does not fit. Wish it came in larger size because this is a great product
customer_reviews.author: JRS

customer_reviews.title: It has multiple storage pockets that are perfect for long trips
customer_reviews.text: This car seat organizer gets high marks from me. It is large enough that it covers the entire back of the seat. It has multiple storage pockets that are perfect for long trips. This item is built very well and looks good in our vehicle. I would recommend this item to others.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy R.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Very cheaply made. The first day the iPad pocket started ripping from both sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Melimel

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love them! they fit snug and there are so ...
customer_reviews.text: I have tried so many different seat organizers, and they all seem to stretch or fall or didn't fit snug against the back of the seat. But not these!!! I absolutely love them! they fit snug and there are so many pockets/holders. The holder for the ipad/dvd is big, but wouldnt work for our dvd players. Only bc ours are smaller so they sit too far down in the pocket for my kids to be able to see them. Kinda had a strong smell to them when I took them out of the packaging, but don't smell a thing now (its only been 2 days). highly recommended them!
customer_reviews.author: Regan

customer_reviews.title: Pouches sagged when color books and or regular books were ...
customer_reviews.text: Pouches sagged when color books and or regular books were put in them. It was able to fit a Kindle Fire 10. Would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: A very good organizer for the car!
customer_reviews.text: This organizer worked out so well for the back seat! The kids had a lot of space to put all of their goods. This way things did not get stepped on and broken during road trip stops. All snacks and drinks could fit into it and were secure as well as their ipads.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: Great  Quality , holds a lot!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad I ordered this it seem to be the only car seat organizer that actually follows the entire width and height of my car seat so I've noticed it holds a lot! I also love that the iPad holder allows you to insert an iPad from the top so that it easily removable. I'm in a 2012 Scion XB.
customer_reviews.author: HelloHumbleHome

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for someone with kids
customer_reviews.text: Was worried if it would look weird on my car seat since I didn’t measure it, but it fit just fine. Good for an on-the-go mom
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Great quality - thick material, lots of pockets - customer service like I've never found
customer_reviews.text: Great product - thick material, lots of pockets, zippers, holds all of my daughters stuff to keep my car clean. Customer service like I've never encountered. This company went out of its way to search me out and make sure I was satisfied and did me a favor without being asked. 100% go with this product and company. All day.
customer_reviews.author: StephieBuckie

customer_reviews.title: Well designed, good quality
customer_reviews.text: Well thought of placement of pockets and pouches. Quality construction.
customer_reviews.author: Maanya

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This was a perfect addition to the backseat for our cross country move! It has several different size pockets, a zip up pocket at that top and a nice size tablet holder. In my Toyota Camry, the holder doesn't sit up high like it would in a van but it was so easy to install and no issues with taking up to much room.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a bit saggy when you start to put items in the pockets even after it is tighten.
customer_reviews.author: Rodezno Family

customer_reviews.title: Fits 9.7 with a case
customer_reviews.text: It’s awesome. I love that it has the buckles at the top and bottom so I don’t have to worry about my little ones foot getting stuck, and ripping it. It just barely fits my 9.7 iPad with a durable case. It slides in out okay but occasionally gets stuck. My only wish would be to have a slit for charging but I understand why that would be difficult to achieve given all the different tablets and charge port sizes
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca O.

customer_reviews.title: Great item worth the price.. but!
customer_reviews.text: This is great! But the clear screen view wrinkles and its sometimes hard to see video clearly (especially when its sunny) but most of similar items have the same problem. I recommend u get a magnetic curtain for yhe window to block some sum when your child is really into watching video in the carseat
customer_reviews.author: HyeJung Park

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Great product well made my 6 year old tried ripping it off the back of my chair and it held together no damage. It has plenty of pockets for organizing his seating area. Also I get emails from the seller checking if the product is working out. I have never had this done before I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Mtnman

customer_reviews.title: Great with one exception
customer_reviews.text: The only reason for my 4 stars is my iPad sort of fits if I take the case off however it doesn’t stay flat against the seat and kind of leans forward a bit. Otherwise my 5yo loves keeping her stuff organized in it.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian White

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't really fit.
customer_reviews.text: If we put it around the headrest, it sits too low to watch a movie. We had to figure out how to wrap it on the headrest but then it is a bother to whoever is sitting in the front seat.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: A lot of storage
customer_reviews.text: This is a little bulky for my 4Runner, with a car seat in front of it, but I think it would be perfect for a larger SUV or even for kids that are just in a booster. Has a lot of storage pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Fit my RAV4 2016 perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Size fits the back seat of my RAV4. Material is durable and has a good amount of storage compartments for my 2 year old.
customer_reviews.author: JDR

customer_reviews.title: Good for storing but not for tablet.
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t stay firm against back seat. Great for storage but not for tablet as it doesn’t stay up enough to watch.
customer_reviews.author: MissCat

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed to stay organized!
customer_reviews.text: What a wonderful organizer! It’s so well made, holds everything and anything, and is already making my life easier with my toddler in the car. She just got a front facing car seat so now it’s really nice to use this for snacks, toys, iPad, water, you name it and not have it all over the car like it was before. Thanks for making a well made and awesome product!
customer_reviews.author: MLC

customer_reviews.title: Best value for all you get.
customer_reviews.text: Bought a new car and can't stand the kids feet on my seat. Perfect quality for the price. Super easy to install and plenty of pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Pyles

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! Thick fabric and stitching, love the rigid backing. Fits our Jeep seat perfectly. Recently installed, will update after well used.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa McKeen

customer_reviews.title: Very cheaply made for the cost
customer_reviews.text: Very cheaply made for the cost can get products this quality for way cheaper it's like a dollar store item they are overcharging for
customer_reviews.author: joshua

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what it’s supposed to do and the pockets are easy for kids to work with. Sturdy. Next day delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Shelli M

customer_reviews.title: Nice, better for booster seats.
customer_reviews.text: Probably more appropriate for booster seats, as the carseat places them too high. Lots of pockets, hopefully it withstands the kicks.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Mills

customer_reviews.title: Good and functional
customer_reviews.text: It's nice and I love that it doesn't sag. But it is already ripping at the top seam by the zipper. My kiddo tries to unzip it with her feet and it's literally just coming apart. I thought it would be tougher than that.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Lots of compartments!
customer_reviews.text: Loved all the compartments. Easy to install. My son loves having everything within reach!
customer_reviews.author: Ranchergirl

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these items prior to a road trip with my kids. Sturdy, save space and allow my children to take on responsibility for arranging the rut personal road trip area! Wonderful purchase so many compartments and the clear tablet screen was a bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Organize Away!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for use during a long road trip and now my daughter used it to store her books and things in the car. Fits nicely over the passenger seat.
customer_reviews.author: Greg and Diane!

customer_reviews.title: Did not hold up :(
customer_reviews.text: Sadly this organizer, as great as it is, did not hold up past one month. The clear plastic where you are supposed to be able to place your child’s electronics ripped only after a few uses. I was unable to stitch it back together.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Helpful
customer_reviews.text: THE BEST PRODUCT EVER INVENTED. Very good product for kids! Keeps everything tidy and organized. Highly recommend. Great for a gift too.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

product_meta.title: DMoose Car Backseat Organizer for Kids with Touchscreen and 9 storage Pockets, Tablet Holder, Water Bottle, Toys, Drinks and Space Saving Storage, Seat Protector Kick Mats and Travel Support
feature_bullets: HANDS-FREE ENTERTAINMENT AND ORGANIZER – Perfect for traveling toddlers and children this backseat car organizer stores snacks, keeps drinks hot or cold with neoprene thermal pockets, and gives kids access to toys, tablets, games, and more

TOUCHSCREEN TABLET POCKET – Ideal for tech-savvy kids we’ve added a responsive, clear window and tablet holder that supports iPad, Samsung, and popular tablets and allows them to watch movies and play games on the go.

SPACE-SAVING VEHICLE STORAGE – Compatible with most vehicle makes and models this car, truck and SUV backseat organizer helps reduce clutter, keep floorboards clean, and makes it easier for parents and kids to grab or store items with less effort.

SMARTER, MORE STABLE DESIGN – Superior to standard back seat organizers that sag and drop we’ve created a stronger adjustable strap, reinforced our buckles, and used 600D polyester to ensure it supports all your toys, snacks, tablets, and essentials

TRUSTED DMOOSE LIFETIME GUARANTEE – Like all of our quality of life home products and accessories our backseat organizer comes with our lifetime guarantee to ensure your total happiness and a risk-free purchase. Contact us with any questions

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars720 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
